Package org.jchassis.event

Generic event handling utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EventCoordinator An interface for an object that is both a source and and a distributor of events.
EventDistributor An interface for an object that notified one or more listeners.
EventFilter An interface for objects that decide which events should be propagated to listeners and which shouldn't.
EventListener An interface that objects that wish to listen for events should implement.
EventSource A source of events.
 

Class Summary
DefaultEventCoordinator Support for collections of listeners.
EventRole The role of an event.
SimpleEventFilter A simple event filter implementation that filters based on an event's data type and role or role prefix.
 

Package org.jchassis.event Description

Generic event handling utilities.

Events not only carry data, but can have "roles". Roles are String metadata that describes what the event represents. It is up to the user of this event API to decide what this is used for.

For example, the event object might be a String, and the role "property/title" signifies that the event source has changed a (JavaBeans) property called "title".

Role names that start with "property/" are reserved for property changes (in the JavaBeans sense). Custom roles that are specific to your application should be prefixed with "app/[your-applications-name]".
